entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low 6.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late this evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 16 except 22 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia early in the morning. High 16 except 22 inland. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
